t=input()
for i in range(0,t):
    n=input()
    d=dict()
    for j in range(0,n):
        a=raw_input()
        n_v=a.split()
        if(n_v[1]=='+'):
            d[n_v[0]]=1
        elif(n_v[1]=='-'):
            d[n_v[0]]=-1
    sum=0
    for k in d:
        sum=sum+d[k]
    print sum
